attributes.action: Ask the Education Dept to ensure the Transgender Trend Pack meets reqd standards
attributes.additional_details:
• it has not been written by anyone with trans healthcare knowledge. 
• it recommends a form of conversion therapy. 
• it is connected to an US Evangelical hate group. 
• it scaremongering about a condition that is not a recognised clinical term.
• it encourages staff to break the law as per the EA2010. 
• it gives false information regarding the legally available treatment for trans youth in the UK. 
• it gives false information regarding the safety of the only UK treatment for trans children.
attributes.background:
We would like to ensure that the Transgender Trend 'Transgender Resource Pack for Schools' reaches the standards required for schools and that the advice given is legally correct as per the Equalities Act 2010.

https://files.acrobat.com/a/preview/92cba42a-35cc-4ac7-ba6c-57cb33756b6a

rejection.details: This guide was not prepared by the UK Government or Parliament.
